title: Add `@since` tag for `asNetwork()`.
body:
Add `@since` tag for `asNetwork()`.

(followup to https://github.com/google/guava/commit/909c593c61a656c2d70f0f9bd1cb0e5cdf43a556)

(Arguably, we should backfill more `@since` tags in `AbstractGraph` and `AbstractBaseGraph` (and not just for `asNetwork()`), but I find it hard to get excited about that.)

RELNOTES=n/a
author: copybara-service[bot]

files_changed.patch:
@@ -50,6 +50,8 @@ interface BaseGraph extends ArchetypeGraph { *

This capability facilitates writing implementations of edge-oriented * code. + * + * @since NEXT */ Network> asNetwork();

@@ -50,6 +50,8 @@ interface BaseGraph extends ArchetypeGraph { *

This capability facilitates writing implementations of edge-oriented * code. + * + * @since NEXT */ Network> asNetwork();
